app.name: Hello World Template

app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template show how to print the message Hello world.

app.name: Read potentiometer sensor value via an ADC HAL Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of reading a potentiometer sensor value through an Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC) using a Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) on a PSoC 6 microcontroller.

app.name: Reading ADC via HAL with Potentiometer Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template provide a starting point for getting ADC via HAL with Potentiometer (P10_6).

app.name: Reading XENSIV-DPS-3XX Pressure Sensor Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template provide a starting point for getting XENSIV-DPS-3XX Pressure Sensor.

app.name: Motion Sensors GUI Integration via Serial Studio Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template is your gateway to developing a modus project that integrates seamlessly with the Serial Studio program for real-time motion sensor data monitoring. Designed to streamline your project's development, it allows for the quick setup and launch of a graphical user interface to visualize and analyze motion sensor data effectively. Harness the power of this template to create a dynamic and interactive monitoring system, enhancing your project's data representation and analysis capabilities through a user-friendly GUI.

app.name: OLED Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of using basic OLED on a PSoC 6 microcontroller.

app.name: GPIO-HAL Troggle LED using Button Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of controlling an LED via GPIO-HAL Push/Pull Button on a PSoC 6 microcontroller, showcasing Push/Pull button to Turn No/OFF LED.

app.name: GPIO-HAL Button Interrupt with LED Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of controlling an LED via GPIO Button interrupt via HAL on a PSoC 6 microcontroller, showcasing Push/Pull button to toggle LED.

app.name: GPIO-PDL Button with LED Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of controlling an LED via GPIO-PDL Push/Pull Button on a PSoC 6 microcontroller, showcasing Push/Pull button to Turn No/OFF LED.

app.name: LED Brightness using PWM via HAL Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of controlling LED brightness using PWM via HAL on a PSoC 6 microcontroller.

app.name: Read POTEN via ADC and Display on OLED Template
app.category: BiiL :: EAST Park Tech Accelerator Program by BDH Group
app.description: This template demonstrates the process of reading a potentiometer sensor value through an Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC) and Display on OLED.
